title: [Bug]: Wayland screen sharing problem like usual...
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

Yes

### Describe the bug

Screen sharing not working on wayland

### What package are you using?

AppImage

### Version

1.13.0

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
Never ending story... bump to latest wayland.
Try to share a screen.
Please bump to Electron v35.0.1
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1.
2.
3.
...
```

### Debug

```markdown
teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
```

### Additional context

_No response_
